Get a Black Friday discount on Apple's loaded M4 Max MacBook Pro.

This exclusive Black Friday deal discounts Apple's brand-new M4 Max MacBook Pro with a top-of-the-line 40-core GPU and 64GB RAM by $320, delivering the lowest price ever. Plus, save on AppleCare with coupon.

To unlock the exclusive $320 discount, apply promo code APINSIDER during Step 4 of checkout at Apple Authorized Reseller Adorama. This loaded configuration in Space Black features Apple's top-of-the-line M4 Max chip with a 16-core CPU and 40-core GPU. It also has a bump up to 64GB unified memory and 1TB of storage, making it a well-equipped model for Apple Intelligence, video editing and more.

At press time, units are drop shipped from Apple distribution to put the laptop in your hands quickly. And those looking to protect the device can also take advantage of $40 off three years of AppleCare with the same APINSIDER coupon. You can find the option to add AppleCare once the system is added to your Adorama shopping cart.

AppleInsider tested the new model in our hands-on M4 Max MacBook Pro 16-inch review and found the machine is a solid upgrade thanks to the performance boost of the M4 Max chip and Thunderbolt 5 support. We also enjoyed the new 12MP camera with support for Desk View.

Every M4 MacBook Pro is eligible for a Black Friday coupon

If the M4 Max chip is more than you need, the APINSIDER coupon also works on every other 16-inch configuration (and 14-inch models too). We've broken down the offers in our Mac Price Guide, which is updated throughout the day leading up to Black Friday.

Latest MacBook Pro price drops

  • 14" M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 48GB, 512GB, Standard Display, Space Black: $2,199* ($200 off)
  • 14" M4 Pro, 12C CPU, 16C GPU, 48GB, 1TB, Standard Display, Space Black: $2,389* ($210 off)
  • 14" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB, 512GB, Standard Display, Space Black: $2,399 ($200 off)
  • 14" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB, 1TB, Standard Display, Space Black: $2,559 ($240 off)
  • 16" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 24GB, 1TB, Standard Display, Space Black: $2,479* ($220 off)
  • 16" M4 Pro, 14C CPU, 20C GPU, 48GB, 1TB, Standard Display, Space Black: $2,879* ($220 off)
  • 16" M4 Max, 16C CPU, 40C GPU, 64GB, 1TB, Standard Display, Space Black: $3,879* ($320 off)
    • *Price with coupon code APINSIDER.

Activating the coupon can be done in three easy steps, which are outlined below:

  1. Add the MacBook Pro to your Adorama shopping cart. Optional AppleCare can be tacked on in your cart as well.
  2. Proceed to checkout. When you get to step 4 (Payment), look for a link with a gift icon that says: "Do you have a gift card or promo code?"
  3. Click that link to bring up the promo code field and enter APINSIDER. Here's what the process looks like:

Enter promo code APINSIDER during Step 4 of checkout.

That's it! You should see the promo code discount reflected in your order total. If you have any trouble redeeming the code, send us a note at deals at appleinsider dot com and we'll be happy to assist.
